description: This file defines a ViewBinding class for the fragment_note_editor.xml layout in an Android project. It provides a minimal interface to access views within the fragment for note editing, including title input, content input, and a save button.

classes.name: FragmentNoteEditorBinding
classes.description: A ViewBinding class that provides access to views within the fragment_note_editor layout, including title and content input fields and a save button.

methods.name: inflate
methods.description: A static method to inflate the layout and create an instance of FragmentNoteEditorBinding.
